attributes.action: Allow people outside of the uk ally countries to visit for 30 days without visa
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen so that Britain could give chances to other people to come and legally be a proud British citizen helping the country grow.
attributes.background: I want our government to allow at least some of the countries which require visa to enter the uk for 30 days without a one. Turkey for instance a safe ally.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to UK immigration arrangements, but we're not sure exactly what rights you want non-UK citizens to have. It's not clear whether you want more relaxed immigration arrangements to apply to all non-UK nationals, or only nationals of certain countries. Your petition also refers to British citizenship, and it's not clear if your petition is just about rights to travel to the UK without a visa, or entitlements to apply for British citizenship.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you start a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.
